text: Guma, ana Fhe Bakɨme khothɨgi fhu, Fhe Bakɨme guigira mba guman ndikndigirga tuktɨgi fhuvara. Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, guma guigira Fhe Bakɨme hara ŋgɨgɨr saŋv, ana khueŋ khothɨgɨri, Fhe Bakɨme ki. Ana vhɨra khueŋ khothɨgɨri, Fhe Bakɨme mba guigira ana kaŋgir zav ana nzuav gari gumgi, ana guigira tɨvir vhuuiŋra mbe mbui.
